snippet.title: Evil Crow - Trailer - Short Horror Walking Game
snippet.description:
https://nannings.itch.io/evil-crow

About
You are stranded in a rural area with a broken car and no help in sight. In this first-person horror game, you have to explore a barn and a tunnel system, and collect tools. You will also witness a dark ritual involving a pentagram that unleashes a terrifying enemy that will hunt you down.

Controls
WASD to move
MOUSE to look around
E or Left Click to interact
​SHIFT ​to run
ESC to pause menu
